接口的使用
planning.PlanningAlgo

  • 使用PlanningAlgo的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    planning  

    • planning中PlanningAlgo的使用

      实现PlanningAlgo的planning中的类 
      修饰符和类型 类 说明
      class  AvoidPlusStation
      policy: avoid plus station: like minimal walking distance but return station cannot be a “plus” station
      class  FastPathToDestination
      policy: fast path to destination: the pickup station is chosen so that the combined walk+ride delay to the destination point d is minimal whereas the return station is chosen so that the walking distance to destination point d is minimal
      class  MinWalDis
      policy: minimal walking distance:the pickup and return stations are chosen so that the /* total walking distance of the trip
      class  PreferPlusStation
      Policy: prefer plus station: with this policy the return station should be a “plus” station (given a “plus” station no further away than 10% of the distance of the closest station to the destination location exists).
      class  PreservationOfUniformity
      with this policy the choice of the source and destination station is affected by the number of available bikes (at source station) and free slots (at destination).
      返回PlanningAlgo的planning中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      PlanningAlgo Solution.getSolver()  
      参数类型为PlanningAlgo的planning中的方法 
      修饰符和类型 方法 说明
      void Solution.setSolver​(PlanningAlgo solver)
